original_name: P. Diddy Presents the Bad Boys of Comedy
plot: A nine-episode series starring underground comedians performing before a live audience at the Brooklyn Academy of Music in New York.
plot_en: A nine-episode series starring underground comedians performing before a live audience at the Brooklyn Academy of Music in New York.
plot_es: A nine-episode series starring underground comedians performing before a live audience at the Brooklyn Academy of Music in New York.
title: P. Diddy Presents the Bad Boys of Comedy
